title: raybucks
author: raybucks
content: Some gambling questions I want to ask please answer.How many percent of signature earnings you gamble away?My salaries 5%.Do you prefer Fiat or crypto at a display currency?I use fiat.What is your favorite game you play all the time?Mine Mines.What is your favorite casino platform?My BC gameAre you a responsible gambler?yes.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I use at least 20 dollars which is 15-17% of my weekly payment but sometimes can go up to over 100 dollars which is my complete weekly payment,I have found the perfect balance though to not overdo it,I simply choose IDR as my currency and I can play with those 20 dollars quite some time as in IDR they are about 300.000 so tons of money to play both in slot machines and sport betting.I prefer crypto of course,use Stake as my main casino because I want to get the benefits with all the VIP level upgrades and I consider myself a responsible gambler since I found IDR as currency.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: What % a person decides to wager each week of their signature earnings in not really your business. You put 5%, but are you actually being paid for your sig? Where I gamble depends on the day. I like to wager a little at the sportsbook on Sundays at a fiat casino close to my house. The thing I enjoy betting on the most is sports, not slots or table games. Betting on a sporting event can occupy way more time than any slot machine might and cost me much less money.You should probably move this to gambling discussion board IMO.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: 1. I don't gamble with my signature earnings at all; they are already all consumed in my weekly budget. I only gamble with money I have left over from spending.2. I prefer fiat to be displayed in my overall balance and even under any currency I have in any of my betting accounts.3. Spot betting is what I play, as that's what I'm familiar with.4. I don't have a favourite casino; I just gamble at any one that enters my eye among the few that I have bookmarked.5. I'm a responsible gambler; I don't even gamble all the time, as I can also classify myself most times as a seasonal gambler; I only gamble once in a while, and I can't even rate how often I do that.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: I don't use my signature earnings for gambling, I am getting paid in Bitcoin and I always move the payments to my cold storage for long-term holding, using such money to gamble is not a good idea. The Fiat displayed is better, even if all I have on the account is USDT or Bitcoin, but when it comes to which currency is favourable for me to use for gambling I will always pick crypto. Sports bet, I don't use to like it but a friend advised me to move closer to football fans and to also watch some football matches, that's where I started to like football out of all other sports games. Still, I like Slots too because of it's simplicity and less time consuming. I  don't want I have a specific Casino is my favourite casino I have open account on up to five different casinos online hand I don't have a specific casino that I use most times I just pick one and make my deposit on the casino to try my luck for the week I have accounts on fortunejack I also have account on stake.com and I also to use Roll bit casino too.I am a responsible gambler because I am far from gambling addiction, it is not very important to me to gamble I only gamble when I feel like gambling unlike people who always feel the urge to gamble everyday I don't see myself doing the same thing, I am very cautious with gambling and I know that losing my money is more possible than winning some money, this is why I am not too into gambling.

Using Fiat money is easier than using crypto money because Fiat money is not too worried about its value unlike crypto which sometimes goes up and down in price. Actually, I prefer to gamble on sports betting, but for some casino games I usually play Limbo, Crash or Poker just for entertainment.My favorite casino is probably Stake.com because it's more comfortable there, although sometimes if I want to find other luck I often play at new casinos or occasionally play at bc.games but I mostly play at Stake.com. comments.author: Questat
comments.body: Quote from: raybucks on October 17, 2023, 07:27:42 AMHow many percent of signature earnings you gamble away?My salaries 5%.Your answer is your salary? You should not answer that question anyway as you aren't in a signature currently, unless you have other accounts enrolled in a campaign. Some consider their earnings in a signature campaign as a salary, but not me. I consider my earnings in a signature campaign as a bonus for being active in the forum. Hence, I can use it to enhance my activity in the crypto space. With my earnings, I can use it on different gambling sites and play different games. I only take it when I earn a good profit, and as for the percentage, I think I go all in.
